mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wh_handover_station ( id, type , serial_number , code , facility_group_id , ou_id , upper_capacity , automatic_warehouse_crossing , chr_id , lifecycle , create_id , create_time , last_modify_time , modified_id, facility_id ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{type,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{serialNumber,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{code,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{facilityGroupId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{upperCapacity,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{automaticWarehouseCrossing,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{chrId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{lifecycle,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{createId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{modifiedId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{facilityId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_handover_station SET type = #{type,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , serial_number = #{serialNumber,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , code = #{code,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , facility_group_id = #{facilityGroupId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , ou_id = #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , upper_capacity = #{upperCapacity,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , automatic_warehouse_crossing = #{automaticWarehouseCrossing,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , chr_id = #{chrId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , lifecycle = #{lifecycle,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , create_id = #{createId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , create_time = #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , modified_id = #{modifiedId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT}, facility_id=#{facilityId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE id = #{id}
